DEMO_807_MSG_010:
̂Perfect... with this new disc, you'll now have a chance to acquire Attihocc's Ring.
ā
DEMO_807_MSG_020:
̂In this specific case, the keywords God of Land acted
as the password this specific item.
ā
DEMO_807_MSG_030:
̂In theory, the keywords God of Sea should allow you to acquire Wadatsumi's Ring...
ā
DEMO_807_MSG_040: ̂And following suit, God of Sky would lead you in the direction of Hoakari's Ring.
DEMO_807_MSG_060:
̂Now that you have the required keywords, why not try creating the remaining discs you lack and getting those accessories!
ā
DEMO_807_MSG_070:
̂Feel free to collect them in any order as well. All
that matters is you're able to find all three of them.
ā
DEMO_807_MSG_080: ̂Once you've acquired an accessory, I'll open the respective portal to allow you to challenge each God associated with it.
